answers.answer: I would keep your feet elevated if possible. Drink lots of water . watermelon is also recommended for feet swelling/leg pain. If it doesn't go down call your doctor
Do you have any health concerns?  High blood pressure, diabetes, preeclampsia?

question: Im having extreme swelling in my feet. When i step down my toes dont touch the floor because my feet are like balloons and i have barely been on my feet today.... should i be worried??? Im 38 weeks and 3 days
title: extreme swelling
